name: Up To Heaven (Augustin Janvier, congusbongus)
description:
Why the devil can not access eternal life by going to heaven ? You are tired of your neverending and painful existance in hell and have decicided you also have the right to sit in heaven, even if you are the devil !

Climb to heaven by dropping blocs in order to create a pile that will let you climb to god !

Controls : click above the platform where god stands to drop blocs. See the tutorial ingame if needed.

Share your best scores in the comment section !

This game have been made in 3 days during the Mini Game Jam 128. Theme was "Health", and limitation was "The only way to go is up".

Big thanks to congusbongus, who created all game musics and sound effects ! -> https://soundcloud.com/congus-bongus
